scripts.dev: cross-env BRANCH=dev concurrently -n server,client -c green,cyan "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev:open: cross-env BRANCH=dev concurrently -n server,client -c green,cyan "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev:open --prefix client"
scripts.build:dev: cross-env BRANCH=dev   npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build:main: cross-env BRANCH=main  npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build:build: cross-env BRANCH=build npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build: echo "Please use build:dev, build:main, or build:build"
scripts.start: echo "Please use start:dev, start:main, or start:build"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix client && npm run format --prefix server
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
